metadata.title: RL78/F23, RL78/F24: Development environment (emulators, flash programmers)

sections.content:
Question:
Is RL78/F23,F24 compatible with E1 emulator and PG-FP5 (flash programmer) used in the previous RL78? 
Answer:
E1 emulator and PG-FP5 (flash programmer) are not compatible with the RL78/F23, F24. Please use the E2 emulator, E2 emulator Lite, and PG-FP6 (flash programmer).
Suitable Products
RL78/F23, RL78/F24
